rows.label: bf02380100_0010
rows.name:
That coward...
He's just hiding behind his Blade!

rows.label: bf02380100_0020
rows.name:
What? Does common sense elude you?
A Blade can regenerate from any injury!

rows.label: bf02380100_0030
rows.name:
Whereas if I die, my Blade
will return to a useless core!

rows.label: bf02380100_0040
rows.name: So it'sokay to use them as a living shield?

rows.label: bf02380100_0050
rows.name:
Even if they can regenerate flesh wounds,
the wounds to the heart don't go away easily.

rows.label: bf02380100_0060
rows.name:
Hahah, how cute. The fleabag thinks we
should care about Blades' feelings.

rows.label: bf02380100_0070
rows.name: Wow wow, how kind of you.
